title: WHY Is John Cleese Demanding Reparations for the Whites??
description:
Dave Landau is in the big-boy chair! Today we'll be discussing the woke Oscars, Mike Tyson's latest pot venture, and John Cleese claiming he deserves reparations for his ancestors. Also, plenty of jokes about the Irish because they're easy targets. #StPatricksDay #MikeTyson #JohnCleese
